required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of ALXN1850 in Participants With Hypophosphatasia (HPP)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-label, Dose-escalating Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of ALXN1850 in Adults With Hypophosphatasia

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, dose-escalating study to assess safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetic (PK), pharmacodynamic (PD), and immunogenicity of ALXN1850 when given intravenous (IV) and subcutaneous (SC) to adults with HPP.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Study participants will be enrolled into 3 cohorts in a sequential fashion.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence Of Treatment-emergent Adverse Events And Treatment-emergent Serious Adverse Events

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under The Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) Of Single IV And Multiple SC Doses Of ALXN1850
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through up to 168 hours following each dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) Of Single IV And Multiple SC Doses Of ALXN1850
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through up to 168 hours following each dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under The Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve Within The Dosing Interval (AUCtau) Values Of The First SC Versus IV Administration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose through up to 168 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline In Plasma Concentrations Of Inorganic Pyrophosphate (PPi)
Change From Baseline In Plasma Concentrations Of Pyridoxal-5'-Phosphate (PLP)
Change From Baseline In Plasma Concentrations Of PLP/Pyridoxal (PL) Ratio

arm_group.description: Three experimental cohorts will be administered 3 dosages (low, medium, high) of ALXN1850, respectively, via IV infusion and/or SC over multiple administration intervals.

intervention.description: ALXN1850 will be administered as an IV infusion and via the SC route.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Confirmed clinical diagnosis of HPP
- Not anticipated to require further treatment with enzyme replacement therapy to treat participant's HPP after study completion
- Willing and able to follow protocol-specified contraception requirements
- Willing and able to give informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Primary or secondary hyperparathyroidism or hypoparathyroidism
- Fracture within 12 weeks of screening
- Current or relevant history of unstable physical or psychiatric illness
- Significant allergies
- Asfotase alfa use within 6 months and/or positive for asfotase alfa antidrug antibody/neutralizing antibodies
